name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Aether Adept
oracle_text: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "The universe is my instrument, and the song I play upon it is one you are forbidden to hear."

name: Amphin Cutthroat
flavor_text:
"The amphin have long built their society in secret. While surface dwellers squabbled over trivial borders, they patiently expanded, building their ammonite temple-caves. Now amphin priests eye the shore, and amphin hunters gird for war."
—Gor Muldrak, *Cryptohistories*

name: Angel's Mercy
oracle_text: You gain 7 life.
flavor_text: Angels appear before both the blessed and the cursed, though most don't know which they are until they feel either the angel's kiss or her sword.

name: Arachnus Web
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

name: Armored Warhorse
flavor_text:
"When we of the Northern Verge claim a mount, no peasant's nag will do. It must be as strong as our virtue, and must join us of its own will."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

name: Assault Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Griffins do not serve. They give freely to those they trust."
—Amira, skycaptain of Thune

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Aven Fleetwing
oracle_text:
Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"It was too fast, even for our veteran archers. They might as well have been blowing it kisses."
—Vulok, elvish archer

name: Benalish Veteran
oracle_text: Whenever Benalish Veteran attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "One day I will rest and join my comrades in the afterlife, but not while scum like you still sully this world."

name: Blood Ogre
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Bloodrage Vampire
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

name: Blood Seeker
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.
flavor_text: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.

name: Bonebreaker Giant
flavor_text: One thing's for sure—his fists are harder than your skull.

name: Bountiful Harvest
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
flavor_text:
"When we fail to see the beauty in every tree, we are no better than humans."
—Saelia, elvish scout

name: Brindle Boar
oracle_text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!"
—Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

name: Brink of Disaster
oracle_text:
Enchant creature or land
When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.
flavor_text:
"When you find yourself teetering on the edge of oblivion, mine will be the hands taking pleasure in giving you the final push."
—Liliana Vess

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

name: Chasm Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Chasm Drake attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Once he's got you, hold on. Fall from a drake and you'll suffer much worse than a bruise."
—Garl, drake trainer

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Coral Merfolk
flavor_text: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.

name: Dark Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.
flavor_text: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Behind every mage is a trail of shattered lies.

name: Devouring Swarm
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Devouring Swarm gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Their arrival is heralded by the deafening hum of ten thousand wings. Their departure is marked by the silence of the dead.

name: Disentomb
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Stop complaining. You can rest when you're dead. Oh—sorry."
—Liliana Vess

name: Distress
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "Of course I'm sure I've gone mad. The little man who crawled out of my eye was quite clear on this."

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Divine Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
flavor_text: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

name: Doom Blade
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

name: Drifting Shade
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Drifting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It stalks the fens by the light of the full moon, gathering shadows as it floats among them.

name: Duskhunter Bat
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Flying
flavor_text: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

name: Fiery Hellhound
oracle_text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There's nothing more exciting than a game of fetch the still-beating heart.

name: Firebreathing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The mage breathed in life-giving air and breathed out death-bringing fire.

name: Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text:
"Those who claim to know the world in its entirety rarely have the requisite perspective."
—Ulmarus the Wise

name: Fling
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor_text: About halfway to the target, Snukk vowed that he had been tricked for the last time.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: It's hard enough to find your way through uncharted wilderness when you can see the tip of your nose.

name: Frost Breath
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: If you have to be stuck somewhere for a while, it's better to be stuck there with a friend.

name: Garruk's Companion
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"The wild is always changing, but it does have a few constants."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

name: Gladecover Scout
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

name: Goblin Arsonist
oracle_text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

name: Goblin Fireslinger
oracle_text: {T}: Goblin Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.

name: Goblin Piker
flavor_text: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Goblin Tunneler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "The best way over the mountain is through."

name: Goblin War Paint
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor_text:
"The secret to our war paint is hot peppers and stinkbugs. Lots of stinkbugs."
—Skab, goblin secretkeeper

name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
oracle_text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His grim ritual ushers the dead to their new life.

name: Greater Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

name: Griffin Rider
oracle_text: As long as you control a Griffin creature, Griffin Rider gets +3/+3 and has flying.
flavor_text: After fighting alongside the griffin riders, older knights of Thune learned to admire a mount that could rip an enemy to shreds in seconds.

name: Griffin Sentinel
oracle_text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

name: Guardians' Pledge
oracle_text: White creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A dozen fighting for each other are worth a thousand fighting for themselves.

name: Harbor Serpent
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

name: Hideous Visage
oracle_text: Creatures you control gain intimidate until end of turn. (Each of those creatures can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor_text: "Seeing you cower before me is its own reward."

name: Ice Cage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

name: Incinerate
oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text:
"Spontaneous combustion is a myth. If you burst into flame, someone wanted you to."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Jace's Erasure
oracle_text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player mill a card.
flavor_text: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: It can chop down a redwood in a single stroke. Your sternum isn't going to fare any better.

name: Lifelink
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: The spoils of war are not measured only in gold and silver.

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"Oh, it's easy enough to kill, but I'm not going anywhere near it."
—Norin the Wary

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Lurking Crocodile
oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Manalith
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unknowingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

name: Manic Vandal
oracle_text: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

name: Merfolk Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

name: Merfolk Mesmerist
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't you think if I saw a half-woman, half-fish with three glowing eyes, I'd have remembered?"
—Drugo, town guard

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Not every thought is a good one.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Peregrine Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: A griffin is not just an eagle's wings and a lion's claws. It is also the fiercest of hearts.

name: Phantasmal Bear
oracle_text: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text:
"You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all."
—Pol Jamaar, illusionist

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

name: Pride Guardian
oracle_text:
Defender
Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Reclaim
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

name: Runeclaw Bear
flavor_text: The only honey it wants is the sweet nectar flowing through your veins.

name: Sacred Wolf
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string."
—Aref the Hunter

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever."
—Razzix, sparkmage

name: Siege Mastodon
flavor_text:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora

name: Skywinder Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Skywinder Drake can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: It's so light and fragile that it can glide where the air is thinnest.

name: Slaughter Cry
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: It's rather embarrassing to end up with your head mounted over his hearth.

name: Sorin's Thirst
oracle_text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

name: Stampeding Rhino
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: The quickest way to get through the jungle is to agitate a rhino and run in its wake.

name: Stave Off
oracle_text: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Stonehorn Dignitary
oracle_text: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.
flavor_text: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.

name: Stormfront Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Its hooves touch the earth only when a hero must rise.

name: Taste of Blood
oracle_text: Taste of Blood deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads, to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams."
—Bram Stoker, *Dracula*

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The pup looked over the treetops, eyeing the man who just yesterday had kicked her. Suddenly, her hunger was infused with pure delight.

name: Tormented Soul
oracle_text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

name: Trollhide
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"It's nothing personal. I'd just prefer if you weren't."
—Ashurel, voidmage

name: Vastwood Gorger
flavor_text: The gorger's insect-like eyes pick up the slightest movement in any direction. Its body then whips toward its prey with startling speed, swallowing it in one engulfing gulp.

name: Wall of Torches
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The foolish try to leap through the unlit spaces. The arrogant believe the fires harmless. The wise find a different door.

name: Warpath Ghoul
flavor_text: Ghouls are often found skulking on the fringes of great battles, showing themselves only to snatch the wounded and weak, dragging their victims screaming into the shadows.

name: Wring Flesh
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't blame me. You're the one walking around with skin."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Zombie Goliath
flavor_text:
"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
